text: The arabic is hidden under Sheet and getWindowTwoRecord which cannot be accessed from HSSFSheet. Easiest is to add a getter and setter. This is needed to enable right to left sheets.
creator: markus.herven@gmail.com

text:
Created attachment 24368
A patch that adds the possiblity to set the arabic property to HSSFSheet
creator: markus.herven@gmail.com

text:
The name "setArabic" is politically insensitive. I renamed it to setRightToLeft() - this name should be fine. The corresponding VBA property is called DisplayRightToLeft.

Yegor
creator: yegor@dinom.ru
